name: Teclada
headline: The modern terminal for modern developers.
description:
Teclada is a powerful web-based terminal built for teams and loved by developers. With Teclada, users can:

   ‣ Enjoy advanced features like visual autocomplete and AI integration - all in their browser

   ‣ Access their computers from anywhere

   ‣ Collaborate seamlessly with multiple users in real-time

Teclada simplifies remote access by:

 ‣ Allowing multiple users to simultaneously view, edit, and execute commands by sharing terminals

   ‣ Transforming plain English into advanced command sequences quickly and accurately with AI-powered assistance

   ‣ Providing web-based access control with role-based permissions and sharing by email address, making access management secure and effortless

Teclada works with any browser and is firewall-friendly, allowing for secure connections to remote computers even when they are behind firewalls or a NAT. Users can keep their sessions intact and uninterrupted, even if they disconnect or switch devices, with the ability to run multiple sessions at once, each with different layouts.

Teclada is the future of remote access and collaboration, making it easier for teams to work together, no matter where they are.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:productivity; industry:compliance; industry:security; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: David Fiala, Founder
founders.description:
David is the CEO of Teclada.

Previously, he led the security effort for Google Health and designed many of the Google-wide core security tech for accessing sensitive data such as PHI and PII.

His PhD is related to supercomputing resilience, high-performance computing, and security/privacy.

Prior to his industrial experience, he served on the NC State University Council.

raw_markdown='[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6626d9dbf6a90549821dc2c7_primary.png)](https://www.teclada.com/</#>)[Features](https://www.teclada.com/</#features>)[Pricing](https://www.teclada.com/</#pricing>)[Contact Us](https://www.teclada.com/</contact>)
# Next Generation SSH
Secure, easy terminal access from any browser
  * Connect from anywhere
  * Easy to configure and manage
  * More secure than traditional SSH

[Schedule Demo](https://www.teclada.com/</contact>)[Learn More](https://www.teclada.com/<#features>)
![Example UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6629695e499104701321f5e7_cncjs.png)
BACKED BY
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6626d6ecbbf6b5850f444267_YC%20Logo%20Expanded%20%E2%80%94%20Orange.svg)
## Browser-based SSH:Cost effective, secure, and convenient
Teclada keeps your team seamlessly connected to servers and workstations. It is incredibly **easy to use** and provides **unparalleled security** controls.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/66284eac6072f24bf8d6a03f_browser-support.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6626d6a695925d9bba806922_iconmonstr-laptop-2-icon.svg)
### No Apps or Installs: Works Anywhere
Getting work done with Teclada is easy because all you need to get connected is a web browser. No downloading, installing, or learning tools built back in the '90s. Teclada is always just a click away on every major browser and operating system.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/66296b889244827795dd7e78_encrypted_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24.svg)
### Zero Network Configuration. No Open Ports.
Teclada's turn-key platform works on any network without requiring your servers to have a static IP or custom firewall rules. And, it does **not** depend on incoming connections or open ports.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/662972032df3c50248345a2f_no-port-22.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/662bed7ebc32925844bae575_multicloud-color.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/662bf00e4a80003e6515fb73_cloud_done_black_24dp.svg)
### One Server or Multi-cloud:Ready to Scale
Desktop PCs, datacenters, AWS, GCP, Azure and beyond: Teclada enables you to access, manage, and audit the activity of your entire fleet from a single unified platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/662bf52d82cb11d476def8fa_terminal_black_24dp.svg)
### Real-time Terminal Sharing and Resumption
Open the same terminal across multiple devices and tabs. Instantly pick up where you left off without losing progress even if your connection drops. Multiple users can all see and type in the same terminal at the same time, just like a Google Doc.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6626d6a695925d9bba80690a_iconmonstr-sitemap-7-icon.svg)
### Powerful, Intuitive Access Control
Sharing access to a system is as simple as entering an email address. Our role-based access control makes it easy to quickly authorize someone to login as any Linux user on a computer. No more SSH key management mess, account creation, or password sharing. Our granular roles empower your users and IT admins to accomplish exactly what they need to do their job.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6626d6a695925d9bba806909_iconmonstr-save-9-icon.svg)
### Tamperproof History and Compliance
Every command and action taken on your systems is proactively logged and reviewable. Unlike traditional SSH history tracking, Teclada safely records all activity before it even reaches your systems. We satisfy your **compliance and security** needs with easy to use search tools, automated security alerts, and dashboards.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6626d6a695925d9bba8068ae/6626d6a695925d9bba8068f7_iconmonstr-control-panel-icon.svg)
### Multi-party Approvals ("2 player mode") and Privileged Access for Oncall
Protect your most sensitive systems by preventing unilateral action. Ensure that your oncall engineers are accessing production services only while they hold the pager. Or allow for escorted access in real-time with multi-party approvals on a command-by-command basis and even live interaction tools.
## Plans & Pricing
Worry-free **30 day****money back guarantee**
### Personal
**Free** (non-commercial use)
**30** Days of History
**10** Systems
**Email** Support
Self-Service Onboarding
Multi-tenant Hosting
[Ping us for access](https://www.teclada.com/</contact>)
### Starter
**$100** /monthIncludes 10 users
**120** Days of History
**150** Systems
**Priority** Support
Professional Onboarding
Multi-tenant Hosting
[Contact Us](https://www.teclada.com/</contact>)
### Pro
**$500** /monthIncludes 20 users
**Unlimited** History
**500** Systems
**Priority** Support
Dedicated Cloud Hosting
White-glove **onboarding**
**SSO** Integration
[Contact Us](https://www.teclada.com/</contact>)
### Enterprise
**Contact Us**
Advanced Security
Multi-Party Approvals andTime-Restricted Access
Supports Offline andAir-Gapped Networks
**Dedicated** Support Team
Dedicated Cloud Hosting,On-Prem, orPhysical Appliance
[Contact Us](https://www.teclada.com/</contact>)
Academic Institutions and Cloud Providers: Reach out to learn how we can uniquely support your organization.

generated_description:
### Teclada: Redefining Remote Terminal Access for Developers

Teclada is carving out a niche in the developer tools landscape as *the modern terminal for modern developers*. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, this startup based in Sunnyvale, CA, is on a mission to improve how teams access and collaborate using terminal commands.

#### What Is Teclada?

At its core, Teclada is a web-based terminal that developers love for its powerful features. It allows users to:

- **Access computers from anywhere**, as long as you have a web browser (no installations needed!).
- **Collaborate in real-time** with multiple users, enhancing teamwork and productivity.
- Benefit from advanced functionalities like **visual autocomplete** and **AI integration**, transforming plain English into actionable command sequences.

#### Why Teclada Matters

In a world where remote work is becoming the norm, Teclada steps up to simplify remote access. Here’s how:

1. **Multi-user Simultaneous Editing**: Multiple users can interact with the same terminal simultaneously, much like a Google Doc. Great for pair programming or collaborative troubleshooting!
  
2. **AI-Powered Command Generation**: Teclada uses AI to convert user-friendly text into advanced command sequences, reducing the learning curve for less experienced team members.

3. **Web-Based Security**: With role-based permissions and easy access controls via email, managing user access becomes a straightforward affair without compromising security.

4. **Firewall-Friendly**: The platform works with any browser and is designed to connect securely, even from behind firewalls or NATs. No need for complex network configurations or static IPs.

5. **Session Resilience**: Users can maintain their sessions across multiple devices, picking up right where they left off, regardless of network interruptions.

#### Robust Features

Teclada offers several compelling features to enhance user experience:

- **Zero Network Configuration**: Get connected without worrying about open ports or firewall rules.
- **Real-Time Terminal Sharing**: Stay connected with peers in real time, seeing and typing commands together.
- **Intuitive Access Control**: Granting access is as simple as sharing an email address, all without traditional SSH key management hassles.
- **Compliance Ready**: Every action is recorded and easily retrievable, ensuring you meet compliance requirements.

#### Pricing Plans

Teclada offers flexible pricing tiers tailored for various users:

- **Personal Plan**: Free for non-commercial use, providing limited history and systems (great for individuals).
- **Starter Plan**: $100/month for small teams, offering a more extended history and support.
- **Pro Plan**: For $500/month, larger teams get unlimited history and dedicated hosting.
- **Enterprise Plan**: Customized solutions for advanced security and larger organizational needs—contact them for details.

#### The Team Behind Teclada

With a small but dedicated team of two, Teclada is backed by notable figures in the startup ecosystem, including Group Partner Michael Seibel from Y Combinator. This close-knit structure allows them to stay agile, responding swiftly to user needs and industry changes.

#### Conclusion

Teclada is not just another terminal; it’s a much-needed evolution in remote access and collaboration for developers. With its suite of intuitive features, ease of use, and robust security, it stands ready to help teams flourish in the ever-growing landscape of remote work. 

Check it out [here](https://www.teclada.com/)!
